1  var Phaser = require('phaser');
2  
3  function Preloader() {
4    this.logo = null;
5    this.splashgroup = null;
6  }

8  Preloader.prototype.preload = function () {
9    this.showLoadingBarAndLogo();

21  
22    game.load.tilemap('map', 'assets/level1.json', null, Phaser.Tilemap.TILED_JSON);

29  Preloader.prototype.create = function () {
30  
31  
32
¶

on create, fade everything out

 
31  
32    var tween = this.add.tween(this.splashgroup).to({
33      alpha: 0
34    }, 1000, Phaser.Easing.Linear.None, true);
35  
36    tween.onComplete.add(function () {
37      this.game.state.start('mainMenu', true, false);
38    }, this);
39  };
40  
41  Preloader.prototype.showLoadingBarAndLogo = function () {
42  
43    var midx = this.game.world.centerX;
44    var midy = this.game.world.centerY;
45  
46  
47
¶

This group is used to conveniently fade out all items in the create function.

 
46  
47    this.splashgroup = this.game.add.group();
48  
49  
50
¶

build loading bar and hook it to phaser Note that the loading bar was already loaded in the previous "boot" state

 
50  
51    var loadingBar = this.add.sprite(midx, midy * 1.8, 'loadingBar');
52    loadingBar.anchor.x = 0.5;
53    loadingBar.anchor.y = 0.5;
54    this.load.setPreloadSprite(loadingBar);
55    this.splashgroup.add(loadingBar);
56  
57  
58
¶

Create a sprite for the logo and fade it in while we load up assets

 
57  
58    var logo = this.add.sprite(midx, midy + 20, 'phaserLogo');
59    logo.anchor.setTo(0.5, 0.5);
60    logo.alpha = 0;
61    this.splashgroup.add(logo);
62  
63
¶

tween the phaser logo

 
62  
63    var fadeIn = this.game.add.tween(logo);
64  
65
¶

fade in

 
64  
65    fadeIn.to({
66      alpha: 1,
67      y: midy
68    }, 1000).start();
69  
70  };
71
